organizations.name: wells masters men's singles results   7   results reuters

text: March 17, 2018 / 10:07 PM / Updated 19 hours ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Mar 18 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Singles matches on Saturday .. Semi-final .. 1-Roger Federer (SUI) beat Borna Coric (CRO) 5-7 6-4 6-4 6-Juan Martin del Potro beat 32-Milos Raonic (CAN) 6-2 6-3 (ARG)
